articles.title: Sing “Yesterday” for Me Showcases Various Forms of Loss We Can All Relate To
articles.description: The series is a journey through the worst of times, will these characters help each other through?Life is filled with moments of happiness and periods when you don't know if the good times will return. SING "YESTERDAY" FOR ME showcases the latter half of that…

articles.author: news+feed@crunchyroll.com
articles.title: NIS America Announces Bonus Trails of Cold Steel III Cosmetic DLC
articles.description: Bonuses come along with the purchase of the Switch's Extracurricular Edition When The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III launches, those who pick up the Extracurricular Edition set for Switch can look forward to another bonus. Read on for more.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 34 - Episode 34
articles.description: A mother drops her young daughter off at Ryo's place with a note that the little girl is being targeted.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 28 - Episode 28
articles.description: An assassin tries to kill the daughter of Umibozu's friend at a violin concert.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 48 - Episode 48
articles.description: Ryo is hired to safeguard the house of a young widow plagued by a thief, who keeps coming to raid her late husband's fine art collection.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 49 - Episode 49
articles.description: Ryo helps a nun who lost her rosary while spending one drunken night of freedom before saying her vows.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 41 - Episode 41
articles.description: When a private investigator opens up shop next door, Ryo is startled to learn his new rival is Saeko's little sister, a former police detective.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 42 - Episode 42
articles.description: Reika Nogami reveals to Ryo that someone high up in the chain of police command has yakuza connections and is responsible for her former partner's murder.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 43 - Episode 43
articles.description: An orphaned best-selling poet seeks Ryo's help after being constantly harassed by perverts recently.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 23 - Episode 23
articles.description: Ryo helps a runaway bride dodge her fiance and his murderous father.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 24 - Episode 24
articles.description: Ryo is hospitalized so he can protect a nurse who has suddenly inherited a fortune from one of her former patients.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 16 - Episode 16
articles.description: A newbie flight attendant goes to her old high school friend Kaori for help when she discovers explosives in her bag.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 38 - Episode 38
articles.description: The daughter of a yakuza boss becomes Ryo's disciple, but also confesses to Kaori that she dreams of a normal life.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 45 - Episode 45
articles.description: The president of a company hires Ryo to guard his three daughters at a ski chalet while he goes off to complete a business merger that makes some people very angry.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 44 - Episode 44
articles.description: Trouble brews after the two young brother's of Ryo's hairdresser find a bag of stolen money in an abandoned building.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 10 - Episode 10
articles.description: A yakuza boss tricks Ryo into bodyguarding his high school daughter.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 8 - Episode 8
articles.description: Detective Saeko Nagami enlists Ryo's help in stealing an ancient treasure from a museum.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 4 - Episode 4
articles.description: Ryo investigates when a series of beautiful women are abducted in Shinjuku.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 6 - Episode 6
articles.description: Ryo is hired as the bodyguard of a popular actress while she's filming a movie.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 13 - Episode 13
articles.description: Saeko hires Ryo to be her bodyguard as she investigates a gym for engaging in human trafficking.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 14 - Episode 14
articles.description: The president of a talent agency hires Ryo to protect his client, a pop star who's received threatening letters.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 22 - Episode 22
articles.description: Ryo protects a runway model from would-be kidnappers.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 25 - Episode 25
articles.description: Ryo teams up with a blonde sweeper from another country to track down a tank smuggling operation.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 20 - Episode 20
articles.description: Ryo is hired as a bodyguard for a naive 18-year-old princess from a remote area of Japan.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 17 - Episode 17
articles.description: When a popular swimsuit designer's new designs are stolen, she hires Ryo to steal them back.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 40 - Episode 40
articles.description: Ryo teams up with an insurance investigator to retrieve a stolen diamond, the Smile of Cleopatra.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 31 - Episode 31
articles.description: A rich young woman hires Ryo to get the guy she likes to quit his biker gang.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 43 - Episode 43
articles.description: An orphaned best-selling poet seeks Ryo's help after being constantly harassed by perverts recently.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 30 - Episode 30
articles.description: When a wealthy adventurer goes missing in Alaska, his nephew hires Ryo as a bodyguard so he can stay alive long enough to ihherit his uncle's fortune.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 22 - Episode 22
articles.description: Ryo protects a runway model from would-be kidnappers.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 18 - Episode 18
articles.description: Ryo steps in when someone wants to silence a shrine maiden for her inconvenient prophecies.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 48 - Episode 48
articles.description: Ryo is hired to safeguard the house of a young widow plagued by a thief, who keeps coming to raid her late husband's fine art collection.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 46 - Episode 46
articles.description: Ryo encounters a pickpocket while out shopping with Kaori one day and both are shocked to see it's one of Kaori's old friends, who's addicted to the thrill.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 26 - Episode 26
articles.description: A rich father hires Ryo to keep an eye on his 18-year-old daughter when she starts working at a fast food place.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 25 - Episode 25
articles.description: Ryo teams up with a blonde sweeper from another country to track down a tank smuggling operation.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 23 - Episode 23
articles.description: Ryo helps a runaway bride dodge her fiance and his murderous father.

articles.description: When threatening letters demand that a movie production be shut down, Ryo is delighted to take on the job of protecting the 20 young women who are auditioning for a major role.

articles.description: The president of a talent agency hires Ryo to protect his client, a pop star who's received threatening letters.

articles.description: A tutor from a war-torn country and her young charge take refuge in Japan, but secret agents are on their trail.

articles.description: Ryo is hired as a bodyguard for a casino dealer who gambles for her freedom against exploitative yakuza bosses.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 35 - Episode 35
articles.description: Ryo is hired as the bodyguard of a popular newscaster who is doing a story on the link between a major politician and the yakuza.

articles.title: City Hunter - Episode 47 - Episode 47
articles.description: When an explosion in a billiards hall leaves a hustler maimed, Ryo steps in to make sure the hustler's daughter's big game isn't marred by her opponent's "dirty pool."

articles.description: When threatening letters demand that a movie production be shut down, Ryo is delighted to take on the job of protecting the 20 young women who are auditioning for a major role.

articles.description: A young girl hires Ryo to protect a children's book author from her dangerous former editor.

articles.description: Umibozu falls in love with a freelance reporter masquerading as a restaurant pianist so she can investigate a crooked politician.

articles.description: A rich young woman hires Ryo to get the guy she likes to quit his biker gang.

articles.description: Ryo becomes the assistant of a phantom thief, whose secret identity is a high school girl.

articles.description: Ryo takes on the case of a boxer who was shot to death just before a title match.

articles.description: Kaori's big brother (and Ryo's partner) is murdered on her 20th birthday.

articles.description: The mafia organization responsible for Makimura's death is back in Japan and their first move is getting rid of Umibozu.

articles.description: Ryo helps a nun who lost her rosary while spending one drunken night of freedom before saying her vows.
